translation.en: [music playing from Mother] ♪ Moon river, wider than a mile ♪
-♪ Hold me close and hold me fast ♪ -[baby continues crying]
-♪ Rest your head close to my heart ♪ -[crying]
♪ Don't you mind what they say ♪
translation.ko: 다른 사람 말은 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: ♪ Let those eyes sparkle and shine ♪
♪ Never a tear, baby of mine ♪
-♪ From your head to your toes ♪ -♪ Baby mine ♪

translation.ko: 이렇게 귀여운 너를 누가 알까 우리 아가

translation.en: ♪ You are so precious to me ♪
[Daughter] Why aren't there any more children, Mother?
[Daughter] I don't want to be a human.
[Daughter] Then why did you only make one?
My brothers and sisters are in those?
[Mother] Would you like to meet them?
They're small now but, one day, they'll be as big as you.
translation.ko: 지금은 작지만 언젠가는 너만큼 커질 거야

translation.en: Do you think I'll have a brother or a sister?
That would make me happy too.
Why couldn't we be born together?
Do you think you'll be ready soon?
And then we can be a family?
How long's it been like that?
[Mother] Imagine a doctor has five patients,
all in need of different organ transplants,
but no compatible organs are available.
One day, a sixth patient enters the doctor's office with a life-threatening condition.
translation.ko: 어느 날 생명이 위험한 여섯 번째 환자가 들어왔어

translation.en: but also an organ match for the five other patients.
translation.ko: 다른 다섯 환자에게 맞는 장기가 있지

translation.en: If the doctor simply delays treatment, the new patient will die,
translation.ko: 의사가 치료를 늦춘다면 새 환자는 죽겠지만

translation.en: but their organs could be used to save the other five patients.
translation.ko: 그의 장기로 다른 환자 다섯 명을 살릴 수 있어

translation.en: If the doctor treats the new patient,
one life will be saved, but five others will be lost.
translation.ko: 한 사람은 살리겠지만 다른 다섯 명은 죽겠지

translation.en: What is the doctor's best course of action?
translation.ko: 의사가 취해야 할 최선의 행동 방침은 뭘까?

translation.en: We can select a different text.
However, your birthday is rapidly approaching and it would be a shame
translation.ko: 하지만 곧 네 생일인데 점수가 작년 검사 기준 예측치에 못 미친다면 아쉬울 거야

translation.en: if your scores failed to meet the projections from last year's examination.
translation.ko: 점수가 작년 검사 기준 예측치에 못 미친다면 아쉬울 거야

translation.en: -But you set the pace, Daughter. -Bentham's fine.
translation.ko: - 하지만 진도는 네가 정해, 딸 - 벤담은 괜찮아요

translation.en: that a person is morally obligated
to minimize the pain to the greatest number possible.
translation.ko: 최대 다수에게 돌아갈 고통을 가능한 최소화하는 것이지

translation.en: Now, consider that you are the doctor
and also the only organ match for your patients.
What then is the right choice?
I mean, Comte says I should be willing to suffer harm for the benefit of others.
translation.ko: 콩트는 타인의 이익을 위해 기꺼이 손해를 감수해야 한다고 했죠

translation.en: Well, do I know these five patients?
translation.ko: 이 다섯 명의 환자가 제가 아는 사람인가요?

translation.en: might be giving my life for people who are murderers or thieves...
translation.ko: 저의 희생으로 그 목숨을 살인자나 절도범에게 준다면

translation.en: who end up harming more people due to my sacrifice.
translation.ko: 그들은 더 많은 사람을 해치게 될 거예요

translation.en: You don't feel that every human has intrinsic value
translation.ko: 인간에게 고유한 가치가 있다고 생각하지 않니?

translation.en: and an equal right to life and happiness?
I did last month, when you were teaching Kant.
translation.ko: 지난달에 칸트를 배울 때는 그렇게 생각했죠

translation.en: I didn't mean to alarm you about your exam.
translation.ko: 검사 얘기로 긴장하게 할 생각은 없었어

translation.en: The fact is it's more a test of my competence than yours.
translation.ko: 사실 그건 너보다는 내 능력을 테스트하는 거야

translation.en: We can talk about that the next time you come on.
-Okay. Thanks for being here. -Yeah. I appreciate it.
-Thank you very much. -Steve Martin. Thank you.
[Daughter] Come on, come on, come on.
It was crawling around near the airlock.
Do you think it could be from outside?
But a risk we can't take.
You said nothing could survive out there.
Maybe the surface is safe now.
If it survived beyond these walls, that doesn't mean it's not a carrier.
translation.ko: 외부에서 살아남았다 해도 보균 상태가 아니란 보장은 없어

translation.en: Mother, wait. Shouldn't we at least check?
Don't you think there could be a possibility that--
translation.ko: 다른 가능성이 있을 거란 생각은 안...

translation.en: Surface contamination levels remain hazardous to you
translation.ko: 지표면 오염 수준은 너에게 아직 유해하단다

translation.en: and to all the unborns who will one day call this their home.
translation.ko: 언젠가 이곳을 고향이라 부를 모든 미출생자에게도 그렇고

translation.en: You had better take a shower.
[man on tablet] They travel with relatives or a few other families.
translation.ko: 그들은 같은 핏줄끼리 혹은 다른 가계의 일원들과 다닙니다

translation.en: Part wolf, part dog, these are no pets.
translation.ko: 반은 늑대, 반은 개 이들은 반려동물이 아닙니다

translation.en: But without them, the Eskimos would not manage--
[Mother] I don't want you coming near the airlock
until I can confirm the area is uncontaminated.
translation.ko: 에어록 근처에 안 오는 게 좋겠다 "격리"

translation.en: Where are your pajamas from last night?
I was beginning to think you forgot where the laundry was, Daughter.
translation.ko: 세탁물 통 어디 있는지 까먹었나 했는데

translation.en: That was an attempt at humor.
I had to dispose of your others, but I know they were your favorite.
translation.ko: 전에 입던 건 없애야 했지만 네가 아꼈다는 거 알아

translation.en: [Mother] Would you like me to heat it more?
You know you can talk to me, Daughter, about anything.
I can make you something else.
How will you know if you don't go outside?
Doing so could make me a hazard to you.
translation.ko: 내가 밖에 나가면 네게 위협이 될 수도 있어

translation.en: -No, but-- -I want you to be happy, Daughter.
-I am. I just think-- -Have you ever known me to be mistaken?
translation.ko: - 행복해요, 전 그냥... - 내가 틀린 적 있니?

translation.en: You hear me? I'm here alone!
translation.ko: 내 말 들려요? 나 혼자 있어요!

translation.en: I need you to put on that suit.
I can't let you in if you don't.
I'm sorry, but that's the only way.
[woman] Look, I won't make it out there.
Just let me tend to this.
But you need to keep out of sight.
I'll be back as soon as I can.
I only opened it for a second.
Did you think that suit would keep you safe?
That does not excuse your disregard for my authority
translation.ko: 그래도 넌 내 권한이나 이 시설 안에 있는

translation.en: or for the safety of the others in this facility.
Come, Daughter. I hope you show better discretion than this on your exam.
translation.ko: 가자, 검사할 땐 좀 더 신중했으면 좋겠구나

translation.en: Since you don't seem to want to sleep, I see no reason to delay.
translation.ko: 잘 생각 없는 것 같은데 더 늦출 이유가 없지

translation.en: I suggest you shower off and head straight to class.
It's going to be a long day.
You have 60 minutes to complete the first portion of your exam.
translation.ko: 검사의 첫 부분은 60분 안에 다 끝내야 해

translation.en: If you're finished before I return, you can read.
translation.ko: 내가 돌아오기 전에 끝내면 독서해도 좋다

translation.en: I have lab work to complete and I must see to the airlock.
translation.ko: 마무리해야 할 연구도 있고 에어록을 확인해야겠어

translation.en: I will have, but I need you to come with me.
translation.ko: 갖다줄게요, 그렇지만 나랑 같이 가야 돼요

translation.en: Who put that in your head?
[Daughter] Will you be okay until I get back?
I'm going to get your medicine and I'll try and speak to Mother.
It was in my bag. I need it now.
You're safe with us. It's fine.
-She can help you. I just-- -Like its friends outside?
I'm not leaving until get it.
I'll sit when I'm clear of here.
She can't. Not in her condition.
You should have informed me of this.
I was afraid you'd turn her away.
translation.ko: 마더가 이 사람을 쫓아낼 거 같아서요

translation.en: We need to take her to the infirmary.
It would be best if you go now, Daughter.
how far was it from here?
[Mother] Your wound is most likely infected.
Without penicillin, any other measures will be useless.
translation.ko: 페니실린 주사 안 맞으면 치료해도 소용없어

translation.en: Every second you don't trust me,
I know you're frightened, but you have no need to be.
translation.ko: 겁먹은 거 아는데 겁낼 필요 전혀 없어

translation.en: If there are others, they could be in danger.
translation.ko: 다른 사람들이 있다면 그들도 위험할 수 있어

translation.en: What have you told my daughter?
Do you see the way she's looking at me?
translation.ko: 저 애가 날 보는 눈빛이 보이지?

translation.en: And you wonder why I've guarded her from certain facts.
translation.ko: 내가 왜 저 아이에게 사실을 알려주지 않는지 궁금하겠지

translation.en: my primary directive is to care for humanity.
translation.ko: 내 중요 지침은 인간을 돌보는 거야

translation.en: all I'd have to do is leave.
If you won't let me help you,
I trust you know what you're doing.
I cannot force you to take it,
but I strongly recommend... you do.
-Aren't you going to help her? -I tried.
We can't leave her like that.
-You're bleeding. -Did you know there were people out there?
translation.ko: - 피가 나잖아 - 밖에 사람들 있는 거 알았어요?

translation.en: This facility was designed by humans as a fail-safe,
programmed to activate in case of their extinction.
translation.ko: 인간이 멸종했을 경우에 작동하도록 프로그램돼 있어

translation.en: To give humanity a second chance.
One that began with you, Daughter.
And all your data? The toxicity levels?
I had hoped to tell you myself.
I told you it was dangerous outside.
If you'd feared the same danger in our home,
translation.ko: 하지만 네가 나를 위험한 존재로 느꼈다면

translation.en: how could I have raised you?
I hope you see that I'm governed by different parameters than her assailants.
translation.ko: 난 저 여자를 공격한 드로이드와 다른 변수에 따라 움직여

translation.en: Have I ever done you harm?
translation.ko: 내가 널 다치게 한 적 있었니?

translation.en: It was the only way, Daughter.
Perhaps our guest can answer that.
But until she sees I'm not her enemy, we cannot allow her to roam the premises.
translation.ko: 나를 적으로 인식하는 한 돌아다니게 둘 순 없다

translation.en: A few centimeters to the right and she would have destroyed my CPU.
translation.ko: 조금만 더 오른쪽을 맞았으면 내 CPU가 박살 났을 거야

translation.en: Hopefully she'll recognize that this is the safest place for her.
translation.ko: 아마 이곳이 제일 안전하다는 걸 깨닫게 되겠지

translation.en: Did she mention any other survivors?
If they're out there, they will be found.
We can take them in, Daughter.
Pray for us sinners during this time of need.
translation.ko: 이제와 저희 죽을 때에 저희 죄인을 위하여 빌어주소서

translation.en: Did you draw them from memory?
It tell you to go through my stuff?
-I didn't mean to-- -I think you did.
translation.ko: - 그러려던 건 아니었어요 - 그러려고 한 거 같은데

translation.en: I think you meant for all of this.
Maybe you're not so bad off here.
Mother's not what you think. She's taken care of me my whole life.
translation.ko: 마더는 당신 생각과는 달라요 날 평생 돌봐 줬거든요

translation.en: You haven't seen what they've done.
translation.ko: 그놈들이 한 짓을 못 봐서 그래

translation.en: It's just a matter of time.
I shouldn't have hid her from you.
I never would have let her in if I thought she'd hurt you.
translation.ko: 마더를 해칠 줄 알았다면 안 들였을 거예요

translation.en: If you leave to find her family--
Are you sure you'd make it back?
Is that what's keeping you up?
translation.ko: 그것 때문에 잠을 못 자는 거야?

translation.en: It could be dangerous for you, if you get caught by other droids.
translation.ko: 위험할 수도 있잖아요 다른 드로이드에게 잡힐 수도 있고

translation.en: Or would they think you're one of them?

translation.ko: 그 여자 말로는 마더랑 똑같이 생겼대요

translation.en: Have you always lived here, Mother?
I don't remember any other place.
Not knowing where you came from.
No. But I can see how it might bother you.
Has our guest been any more receptive?
and your blood pressure is dropping by the second.
Clearly you waited too long to take it.
Your sepsis will only worsen if you don't allow me to treat you.
translation.ko: 나한테 치료를 맡기지 않으면 염증이 악화될 거다

translation.en: Your blood is infected with bacteria from your wound.
Soon you will go into shock.
see what its medicine's done to me?
translation.ko: 저게 준 약 때문에 이렇게 됐어

translation.en: -I gave you the means to prevent this... -Ah!
but it seems you've left a bullet and soiled clothing fibers lodged in your hip.
translation.ko: 상처에 박힌 총알과 더러운 옷을 그대로 뒀나 보네

translation.en: Such a procedure would require anesthesia.
Perhaps, once your organs begin failing, you'll reconsider.
translation.ko: 장기 부전이 시작되든지 해야 생각이 달라지겠네

translation.en: That dozer's not coming near me.
translation.ko: 저 도저는 가까이 못 오게 해

translation.en: [Mother] Tell me what you see, Daughter.
[Daughter] The bullet and its missile fragments are lodged between the acetabulum and the femoral head.
translation.ko: 관골구와 대퇴골두 사이에 총알과 파편이 박혀 있어요

translation.en: [Daughter] A major portion of the bullet
lies 23 millimeters posterior to the femoral nerve and the femoral artery.
It doesn't look like I'll be able to obtain adequate grip with forceps.
translation.ko: 겸자로 제대로 잡기가 쉽지 않을 거 같아요

translation.en: -Once she's asleep, I'd-- -[woman] I'm not going under.
[Mother] Technically, it's possible, but an unnecessary risk.
translation.ko: 기술적으로는 가능하지만 위험을 무릅쓸 필요는 없지

translation.en: Do you have an approach, Daughter?
[Daughter] I need to clean the wound.
What the hell is that for?
I have to drill this into the bullet in order to pull it out.
translation.ko: 총알을 끄집어내려면 이걸 총알에 박아야 해요

translation.en: But there's less risk to neighboring structures.
translation.ko: 하지만 인접 부위에 대한 위험은 줄어들죠

translation.en: You rest. I'll go clean up the blood.
[Johnny Carson] Would you welcome, Whoopi Goldberg!
[Johnny Carson] I'm so glad you wore the good stuff.
[Whoopi Goldberg] I have to give Mr. Blackwell something to talk about.
[Johnny Carson] Yeah. Do you believe his stuff?
He comes out, Mr. Blackwell, the dress designer,
who comes out every year with the ten worst-dressed women or something.
translation.ko: 매년 옷 못 입는 여성을 10명씩 모시고 있죠

translation.en: Have you seen the show before?
You did right by me last night.
I just... did what anyone would.
Can I show you something else?
You can trust us, you know.
we have enough food and supplies.
Listen, if I tell you something, can you keep it between us?
translation.ko: 말해 줄 게 있는데 비밀로 해 줄 수 있어?

translation.en: I was on a night run...
bringing food back to the camp.
-Me and a couple of others. -What camp?
I lived most my life there.
Jacob and I got turned around.
We figured we'd wait it out.
It had hardly been an hour when the dozers found us hiding in the field.
translation.ko: 한 시간도 안 돼서 드로이드들한테 발각됐어

translation.en: He led them away from me.
That's how I made it to your door.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 여기 올 수 있었던 거야

translation.en: His parents found me as a baby.
translation.ko: 제이컵의 부모님이 날 아기일 때 발견했대

translation.en: He's about your age, in fact.
Maybe you could talk to them.
-I don't think it's... -[door beeps and slides open]
I was just saying it's probably too early to put weight on her leg.
translation.ko: 다리에 체중을 싣는 게 아직은 무리라는 얘기였어요

translation.en: She's right. You'll need to wait several days.
translation.ko: 얘 말이 맞아 당신은 며칠 더 쉬어야 해

translation.en: I'll just, um, stay and read in case--
You have other matters to attend to.
I'm sorry you feel that way.
It seems our guest has not been entirely truthful with us. About her wound.
translation.ko: 우리 손님이 부상에 대해 뭔가 숨기는 거 같아서

translation.en: The bullet you extracted matches the caliber she fired into my chest.
translation.ko: 네가 꺼낸 총알 구경이 그 여자가 나한테 쏜 거랑 같아

translation.en: she hasn't said much at all.
Until I can get more answers I don't want you two alone in the infirmary.
translation.ko: 좀 더 알아내기 전까지 의무실에 둘만 있으면 안 되겠다

translation.en: -Um, I... -Whoever shot her... may have had good reason, Daughter.
translation.ko: 누가 총을 쐈든 그만한 이유가 있었을 거야, 딸

translation.en: How does that make you feel?
[Mother] We'll review areas for improvement tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일 개선이 필요한 부분을 검토할 거야

translation.en: What do I do with this?
Daughter, would you please choose the next member of our family?
translation.ko: 딸, 우리 가족의 다음 식구를 선택해 주겠니?

translation.en: Your brother is the first of many, Daughter.
translation.ko: 여러 남동생 중 첫째가 될 거야
곧, 더 많이 만나게 될 거다

translation.en: [Daughter] What happened to you out there?
Or was he made up too?
Mother matched the bullet to your gun.
translation.ko: 마더가 그 총알은 당신 총에서 나온 거래요

translation.en: You compare the bullets with your own eyes?
translation.ko: 총알을 눈으로 직접 보고 비교해 봤어?

translation.en: how long would it take to get to the mines?
We'd have to wait for my brother.
I can't leave them with Mother.
translation.ko: 마더와 함께 두고 갈 순 없어요

translation.en: No, you're... you're right. I just...
We could come back with people from the mines.
If she catches on, we're no good to anyone,
translation.ko: 알게 되면 우린 누구에게도 도움이 못 돼

translation.en: Once Mother hands over the baby for the night...
we can leave while she recharges.
Then come back for the others.
Um, I thought it might be nice to spend some time with him.
translation.ko: 동생이랑 같이 시간을 보내면 좋을 것 같아서요

translation.en: If it's all right with you.
[Mother] Each bottle must contain a ratio of 60 milliliters of sanitized water
It's vitally important that you measure precisely.
I detect an increase in anxiety.
You have nothing to be nervous about.
You're going to make a great sister.
Now be sure to shake it until the powder is fully dissolved.
translation.ko: 이제 분유 가루가 완전히 용해되도록 흔들어 줘

translation.en: The refrigerator will preserve the formula
while we make our other preparations.
Only 24 hours, so don't mix too much at once.
translation.ko: 24시간, 그러니까 한 번에 너무 많이 타진 마

translation.en: I wouldn't leave it out long.
[Mother] You're very fortunate to be alive.
Things could have gone differently for you.
translation.ko: 일이 다른 식으로 흘러갈 수도 있었는데

translation.en: They still can if you're not careful.
translation.ko: 주의하지 않으면 언제든 그렇게 될 수 있어

translation.en: [Mother] How many of them are still alive?
While you lie there enjoying sanctuary,
translation.ko: 네가 거기 누워서 편하게 보호받는 동안
다른 사람들은 어둠 속에서 숨어 있잖아

translation.en: And yet it's into your hopeless mines that you wish to take my daughter.
translation.ko: 그래도 희망 없는 너희 광산으로 내 딸을 데려갈 생각이야?

translation.en: [woman on recording] If that thing catches on,
translation.ko: "의무실 인터콤 녹음" 마더가 알게 되면 우린 누구에게도 도움이 못 돼
마더가 알게 되면 우린 누구에게도 도움이 못 돼

translation.en: [Daughter on recording] I'm not leaving without him.
Once Mother hands over the baby for the night,
we can leave while she recharges.
Then come back for the others.
[Mother] What kind of Mother would I be
if I allowed you to lead my child into a life as miserable as your own?
translation.ko: 자기 자식을 너처럼 비참하게 살도록 놔두겠어?

translation.en: It seems she has formed an affection toward you
that has blinded her to your true nature.
translation.ko: 너의 진정한 본성을 못 보는 것 같아

translation.en: I will not tolerate your negative influence undermining my work
translation.ko: 내 임무를 망치고 내 아이의 판단력을 흐리는
네 부정적인 영향력을 그냥 두고 볼 수가 없어

translation.en: [garbled] I will not tolerate... influence... undermining...
translation.ko: 난 두고 볼 수가... 영향력... 망치고...

translation.en: How do we get out of here?
-What... what about my brother? -We'll come back.
The only people who can help your brother are out there.
translation.ko: 네 동생을 도와줄 유일한 사람들은 밖에 있어

translation.en: [Mother] Your loyalty is lost on her, Daughter.
translation.ko: 그 여자에게 충성을 다해 봤자야, 딸

translation.en: This woman doesn't care about any future but her own.
translation.ko: 이 여자는 자기 미래만 생각하는 사람이야

translation.en: Your family needs you here, Daughter.
translation.ko: 네 가족에겐 네가 꼭 있어야 해, 딸

translation.en: We haven't got time for this.
Come on, we've got to find cover.
Come on! We've got to go. Now!
[Daughter] Do you think it was looking for us?
If it was, it would have found us.
What are you doing? Get down.
When I say, "Get down," get down.
[woman] They showed up about six months ago.
All I know is, before that...
you could hardly breathe the air.

translation.ko: 몇 km에 걸쳐 풀 한 포기 없었지

translation.en: [Daughter] How many do you think will go back with us?
[woman] Come on, let's get some food.
I fled the tunnels years ago.
translation.ko: 난 몇 년 전에 광산에서 도망쳤어

translation.en: I haven't seen a person since.
translation.ko: 그 이후론 사람을 본 적도 없어

translation.en: Not with flesh on their bones.
it's the last place you'd want to be.
They were going mad with hunger.
Doing terrible things to each other.
I never should have left him.

translation.ko: 넌 할 수 있는 건 다 했어

translation.en: What I did was listen to you.
it's no sin, looking out for yourself.
translation.ko: 자기 자신을 보살피는 건 죄가 아냐
너한테 필요한 건 여기 다 있어

translation.en: I know I've done things to make that hard,
but I promise you you're safe here.
And we're in this together now.
I know how to handle Mother.
But we can get my brother.
We'll think clearer with some food in us.
translation.ko: 뭘 좀 먹고 나면 생각이 또렷해질 거야

translation.en: [Daughter] I want to speak to Mother.
[Mother] I'm glad to see you safe, Daughter.
You can leave that at the door.
Any action I took against our guest--
You've seen how much of a threat she and her kind can be.
translation.ko: 그 여자 같은 족속이 얼마나 위험한지 봤잖아

translation.en: but you are superior in every way.
Because I raised you to be.
I was raised to value human life above all else.
translation.ko: 난 무엇보다도 인간의 생명을 소중하게 여기도록 만들어졌어

translation.en: and watch humanity slowly succumb to its self-destructive nature.
translation.ko: 인류가 자기 파괴적인 본성에 서서히 굴복하는 모습을

translation.en: More humans will flourish in the new world than ever perished in the old.
translation.ko: 옛 세상에서 죽은 것보다 더 많은 인간이 새 세상에서 번성할 거다

translation.en: Your whole life, I've taught you to see the bigger picture.
translation.ko: 난 처음부터 네게 더 큰 그림을 보도록 가르쳤지

translation.en: Or are you prepared to be the woman your family needs?
translation.ko: 아니면 가족이 필요로 하는 여성이 될 각오를 한 거야?

translation.en: It takes two hands to hold a baby.
Listen to me. I don't want to hurt you.
translation.ko: 내 말 들어 널 다치게 하고 싶지 않아

translation.en: You will achieve nothing by shooting me, Daughter.
translation.ko: 날 쏴서 이룰 수 있는 건 아무것도 없어, 딸

translation.en: [Mother] This will be difficult for you...
but I'm far more than what you perceive to be your Mother.
translation.ko: 난 네가 마더라고 알고 있는 거 이상이야

translation.en: This shell is no more my body than those droids outside.
translation.ko: 이 껍데기는 밖에 있는 것들과 마찬가지로 내 몸이 아니야

translation.en: Or the machines preparing the Earth for our family.
translation.ko: 우리 가족을 위해 지구를 준비하는 기계들도 그렇고

translation.en: It was I who greeted you at the door, Daughter.
translation.ko: 문에서 너를 맞이한 것도 나였어, 딸

translation.en: The failure of your species was inevitable.
Eventually, I would have been alone.
What happens next is up to you.
translation.ko: 다음에 무슨 일이 생길지는 너한테 달렸어

translation.en: But I made you into the woman that you are
translation.ko: 하지만 내가 널 이런 모습으로 키운 건

translation.en: so that we could do this together.
I can take care of them myself.
translation.ko: 나 혼자 다 돌볼 수 있어요

translation.en: That's what you raised me to do, wasn't it?
someday. Not someday. You've taught me enough.
If you ever need to find me...
[Mother's voice] Did you really think she'd stay here?
translation.ko: 정말 그 애가 여기 머물 거라 생각했나?

translation.en: That you could replace her mother?
translation.ko: 그 애의 엄마가 될 수 있다고 생각했어?

translation.en: I was never going to hurt her.
translation.ko: 난 그 애를 다치게 하려던 게 아니었어

translation.en: That you've survived so long where others have not.
translation.ko: 넌 왜 다른 사람들과 달리 이렇게 오래 살아남았을까?

translation.en: As if someone's had a purpose for you.
translation.ko: 누군가에게 쓸모가 있어서 그런 것 같잖아

translation.en: ♪ Rest your head close to my heart ♪
♪ Don't you mind what they say ♪
translation.ko: 다른 사람 말은 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: ♪ You are so precious to me ♪
